item.description: Navena Chaitoo is currently Assistant Executive Director of Research at the NYC Board of Correction. Previously, she held research positions at NYC Health + Hospitals/ Correctional Health Services, the NYC Mayorâ€™s Office of Criminal Justice, Vera Institute of Justice, and the Center for Alternative Sentencing and Employment Services (CASES). Her work focuses on developing, piloting, and implementing interventions for people with complex medical needs who are involved with the criminal legal system.

NYC Board of Correction Public Meeting (October 8, 2024) CUNY Graduate Center Dissertation Showcase (May 17, 2023) Pioneer of the Disability Rights Movement Speaks at Fordham: A Conversation with Judy Heumann (October 16, 2020) 20 in Their 20s: Navena Chaitoo (June 29, 2017) Rose Hill Student Wins National Science Foundation Graduate Research (May 13, 2013)
